channel.title: Pub/Sub on Floyd Hightower
channel.description: Recent content in Pub/Sub on Floyd Hightower

item.title: Pub/Sub in a Nutshell
item.description: Intro This post is part of a series of posts with notes as I’m studying for Google’s Professional Data Engineer Certification. This particular post covers Pub/Sub in a nutshell. Disclaimer The content of these posts is written before I have taken the exam. I do not guarantee the accuracy or long-term reliability of these notes. Use them at your own risk and always defer to Google’s docs as canon. Pub/Sub Fully managed, data ingestion and distro.
